price: (Ɛyε kͻkͻbͻ) de ma mo mu obi a ͻpεsε ɔnya nkͻsoͻ anaasε ͻka akyire.
arabic: لِمَن شَآءَ مِنكُمۡ أَن يَتَقَدَّمَ أَوۡ يَتَأَخَّرَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: liman shāa minkum an yataqaddama aw yata-akhara
